customStages.label: Initial Rest
customStages.instructions: 1-minute initial rest stage (non-fermentation) to start the test.

customStages.label: Short Ferment Test
customStages.instructions: 5-minute fermentation test stage to verify Q10 timing logic.

customStages.label: Mid Rest
customStages.instructions: 2-minute mid rest stage (non-fermentation) between fermentation tests.

customStages.label: Medium Ferment Test
customStages.instructions: 10-minute fermentation test stage to verify consistent timing.

customStages.label: Pre-Long Rest
customStages.instructions: 1-minute pre-long rest stage (non-fermentation) before long ferment.

customStages.label: Long Ferment Test
customStages.instructions: 900-minute (15-hour) fermentation test stage to verify extended timing.

customStages.label: Final Rest
customStages.instructions: Final 2-minute rest stage (non-fermentation) to complete the test.
